description:
Protect the floor of your MSR Tent and extend the life of your tent, this footprint is designed to better protect your tent from wear-and-tear. Compatible with MSR Hubba, Freelite 1 and Carbon Reflex 1 tents.

  • Sized to fit the floor of the your MSR Tent and designed so it doesn't channel rain underneath
  • Dimensions: 211 x 71cm
name: MSR Universal 1 Regular Footprint
